job_history.role_name: NC AIR GUARD HEALTH SERVICES MANAGER
job_history.work_description: Performs and directs patient management functions. Interprets communications, directives, and publications. Coordinates release of information functions. Prepares health record copies and abstracts. Maintains patient locator and suspense files. Prepares, codes, and transmits clinical record cover sheets. Transcribes daily information onto charts. Transcribes physicians' orders, and prepares requests for diagnostic tests, consultations, and referrals. Performs functions to admit, discharge, and transfer patients. Compiles information and prepares reports, graphs, and charts on bed occupancy, staffing, dental health, medical care from civilian sources, and professional activities.

Performs client-level information technology support functions. Manages hardware and software. Performs configuration, management, and troubleshooting. Removes and replaces components and peripherals to restore system operation. Installs and configures software operating systems and applications. Provides service to end-users for operation, restoration, and configuration of information systems. Reports security incidents and executes corrective security procedures.

Operates and supervises the base medical equipment management office and non-medical material support. Validates and coordinates equipment requests. Monitors expense and investment equipment fund programs. Ensures in-use equipment asset inventories are accomplished and necessary corrective actions and documentation is taken. Provides and monitors non-medical supply and equipment support.

skills.name: Healthcare Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in healthcare management, including patient management, health record maintenance, and medical supply management, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Patient Care
skills.explanation: Has experience in patient management functions, including admitting, discharging, and transferring patients, and preparing health records, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Medical Records Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in maintaining patient locator and suspense files, preparing health record copies and abstracts, and transcribing daily information onto charts, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: IT Support
skills.explanation: Has some experience in client-level information technology support functions, including configuration, management, and troubleshooting, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Supply Chain Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in operating and supervising the base medical equipment management office and non-medical material support, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has some experience in supervising and managing teams, including the base medical equipment management office, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has some experience in compiling information and preparing reports, graphs, and charts on bed occupancy, staffing, and other healthcare metrics, indicating some practical experience.
